DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study Collecting data Electroencephalograph base algorithm detection onset deterioration Acute Ischemic Stroke Comparison NIHSS .
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion study population Age > 18 year old . Acute stroke symptom onset within 120 hour inclusion , proximate event possible . Acute ischemic moderate severe hemispheric stroke ( assess 5 point NIHSS ) include patient treat t-PA Exclusion criterion study population Primary intracranial hemorrhage admission CT . Significant movement disorder . Previous major hemispheric stroke . Local skull skin affliction prevents electrodes application . Any known condition opinion investigator may interfere protocol implementation . Inclusion criterion Control Population Age > 18 year old . Exclusion criterion Control Population Primary intracranial hemorrhage admission CT . Significant movement disorder . Previous major hemispheric stroke . Local skull skin affliction prevents electrodes application . Migraine Any known condition opinion investigator may interfere protocol implementation .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year old . Acute stroke symptom onset within 120 hour inclusion , proximate event possible . Acute ischemic moderate severe hemispheric stroke ( assess 5 point NIHSS ) include patient treat tPA Primary intracranial hemorrhage admission CT . Significant movement disorder . Previous major hemispheric stroke . Local skull skin affliction prevents electrodes application . Any known condition opinion investigator may interfere protocol implementation
